name: shell-trap
flavor_text: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pok√©mon.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user was not yet hit by an opponent's physical move this turn, this move will fail.
effect_text_simple: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
